      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Jordaria.onError(Error error)
      Show an error dialog detailing the error message that was fired.
      void Jordaria.onShutdown(ShuttingDown shutdown)

    • Uses of EventHandler in net.jordaria.debug

      Methods in net.jordaria.debug with annotations of type EventHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DebugConsole.onDebugMessage(DebugMessage event)
      Appends the events message to the text area.
      void DebugConsole.onEntityMoveRequest(EntityMoveRequest event)
      If moving events are set to display, appends a message informing of the movement and direction.
      void DebugConsole.onEventSystemStarted(EventSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
      void DebugConsole.onGraphicsSystemStarted(GraphicsSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
      void DebugConsole.onPhysicsSystemStarted(PhysicsSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
      void DebugPanel.onShutdown(ShuttingDown event)
      Removes all components, hides the frame, and removes the reference to the frame for garbage collection to clear out.
      void DebugItemGenPanel.onShutdown(ShuttingDown event)
      Removes all components, hides the frame, and removes the reference to the frame for garbage collection to clear out.
      void DebugConsole.onShutdown(ShuttingDown event)
      Removes all components, hides the frame, and removes the reference to the frame for garbage collection to clear out.
      void DebugConsole.onSoundSystemStarted(SoundSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
